content: ** single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending last repeat at ** join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off emmalynn square www gourmetcrochet com 1 corner work corner in every other valley between scallops creating four separate corners notes counting from half_double_crochet to half_double_crochet each scallop has 13 sts do not count single_crochet between scallops when counting stitches on scallop both of the corner row below are anchored to round 6 with a slip_stitch at beginning and end join with slip_stitch in tenth st of scallop row 1 join b with sl st in tenth st of first scallop 5 treble_crochet in single_crochet between scallops sl st in fourth st of next scallop fasten_off slip_stitch in fourth st of next scallop emmalynn square www gourmetcrochet com 2 join with slip_stitch in seventh st of first scallop slip_stitch in seventh st of next scallop row 2 join c with slip_stitch in seventh st of first scallop this is center double_crochet of 3-double_crochet group at top of scallop 2 double_crochet in next treble_crochet 2 times 5 treble_crochet in next treble_crochet 2 double_crochet in next treble_crochet 2 times slip_stitch in seventh st of next scallop fasten_off emmalynn square www gourmetcrochet com 3 remaining rnds round 7 join d with single_crochet in center treble_crochet of 5-treble_crochet group at any corner 2 single_crochet in same st *single_crochet in next 6 sts single_crochet in next st same st as slip_stitch was worked in for corner single_crochet in next 3 sts half_double_crochet in next 2 sts yo pull up lp in next st yo pull through 2 lps on hook skip next single_crochet yo pull up lp in next st yo pull through 2 lps on hook yo pull through all 3 lps on hook half_double_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet in next st same st as slip_stitch was worked in for corner single_crochet in next 6 sts ** 3 single_crochet in next st for corner repeat from * around ending last repeat at ** join fasten_off round 8 join e with slip_stitch in center single_crochet of any 3-single_crochet group at corner chain 3 counts as double_crochet 4 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each st around with 5 double_crochet in center single_crochet of 3-single_crochet group at each corner join fasten_off round 9 join a with slip_stitch in center double_crochet of any 5-double_crochet group at corner chain 3 counts as double_crochet 4 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each st around with 5 double_crochet in center double_crochet of 5-double_crochet group at each corner join fasten_off repeat last round as needed working last round in single_crochet half_double_crochet or double_crochet as needed to achieve 12 measurement emmalynn square www gourmetcrochet com 4
